chat.title: various
chat.message:
- link to the frostbite treatment algo at the top is broken
- do we have iloprost at UHNBC or does it need to be brought from elsewhere?
- maybe add something about which therapies dictate the disposition (ex. tpa -> ICU, can iloprost be done on the ward?)
- add hydromorphone for analgesia option
I like the way it is set out. It helps new to practice physicians and those who have not manage frostbite before, know what to do do step-wise
